experience.title: Information Technology Consultant
experience.description: Provided hardware and software IT support, including building, repairing and upgrading desktops and laptops; installed and configured servers, printers and routers; performed basic network setup and troubleshooting; installed software and printers; supported IT needs of individuals. Accomplishments: set up network for a small non-profit organization; created organizational spreadsheets for daily operations and marketing; upgraded SQL and Time Matters for Edward S. Clay, P.A.

experience.title: Office Administrator/Billing Assistant
experience.description: Assisted with administrative duties in operations; created airtime spreadsheets and supported revenue reporting; data entry into internal billing system (UCAP); downloaded invoices and data files from airtime carriers; performed monthly airtime billing using UCAP; activated/deactivated SIMs/devices; ran usage and airtime reports; reconciled carrier charges to UCAP output; placed orders, received and shipped packages.

experience.title: Funding & Settlement Coordinator/Office Manager
experience.description: Managed asset re-titling into trusts; entered client data into database and legal document generation software; built long-term relationships with trust maintenance clients; ordered office supplies and legal document supplies; answered phones; scheduled appointments; managed attorney's calendar; printed legal documents and prepared delivery binders; reviewed legal documents for formatting errors and missing information; witnessed clients' signatures on legal documents; notarized certain signatures; generated funding instructions for trust clients (Family Legacy and Documents Only); troubleshooted and maintained computer network and workstations; achieved growth in client base; managed probate processes and funding of assets; supervised the office and performed related tasks independently.

experience.title: Student Operations Specialist
experience.description: Prepared student reports for state regulatory agencies and ACCET; answered phones; data entry of enrollments and materials; reported inventory and distribution of student classroom materials to CFO; developed complex Excel and Visual Basic spreadsheets; published and updated student policy catalog; protected student privacy under FERPA; managed course scheduling for 25 schools and all student records and transcripts; maintained records of complaints and collaborated on responses; contributed to cost savings of over $4 million by strengthening textbook inventory controls.

experience.title: Information Technology Coordinator
experience.description: Installation and troubleshooting of Windows 2000 workstations; hardware, printers, peripherals and software; managed telecommunications system administration, programming and troubleshooting; trained brokers and new employees on system and applications; processed stock certificates and checks; supervised operations staff; maintained records for annual audits and SEC compliance; resolved trade errors; earned multiple fast-track promotions; primary technical troubleshooter for 93 work stations and 6 remote offices.

education.degree: Certificate of Completion, Microsoft Certified Systems Engineer Training
